sentences.en: "the survival of the fittest," a slogan that virtually preempted all debate.
sentences.cn: “适者生存”，一个几乎无可辩驳的口号。

sentences.en: And some prosecutors are attempting to preempt any potential fallout from the CSI effect.
sentences.cn: 有些检察官会设法排除CSI效应的影响.

sentences.en: Better preempt to keep the opponent from bidding.
sentences.cn: 最好采用阻击叫,使对方难以参加竞叫.

sentences.en: Better preempt to keep the opponents from bidding.
sentences.cn: 最好还是先发制人叫高牌,别让对方有机会叫牌.

sentences.en: For example, federal statutes might explicitly preempt, or explicitly waive any preemption of, state law.
sentences.cn: 例如, 联邦法律可以明确的先占, 或明确的取消州法律的先占.

sentences.en: Hopefully, Google's actions will promote, not preempt that debate.
sentences.cn: 但愿谷歌的行为将推动这场辩论, 而不是在辩论中先发制人.

sentences.en: I advised him against it, because to preempt his own deadline might confuse our adversaries.
sentences.cn: 我建议他不要这样做, 因为他在自己提出的最后期限之前就抢先采取行动,可能使我们的敌人莫名其妙.

sentences.en: Love with no need to preempt grievance.
sentences.cn: 不需要抢先取得抱怨的爱.

sentences.en: Special Forces are often deployed to preclude , preempt and resolve terrorist incidents abroad.
sentences.cn: 特种部队常常被派遣去预防、解决各地恐怖事件.

sentences.en: The Clean Water Act expressly provides that it does not preempt more stringent state law.
sentences.cn: 《洁净水法案》明确规定,该法并不先占更为严格的州法律.

sentences.en: The law would preempt stronger local rules.
sentences.cn: 该法律将预先制止更强硬的地方性法规。

sentences.en: The local people fenced the land to preempt it against other claimants.
sentences.cn: 当地人把地围了起来,以获得排斥他人购买该地的优先购买权.

sentences.en: The workers took control of the factory in order to preempt its sale by the owners.
sentences.cn: 工人抢先占据了工厂以阻止厂主将工厂出售.

sentences.en: They do not preempt the land surface that is useful for other purposes.
sentences.cn: 它们不预先占用对其它目的有用的地面.

sentences.en: To preempt that potential objection, you have to signal your intentions early on.
sentences.cn: 为了应付对方可能会有的排斥心态, 你必须尽早表明自己买房子的目的.

sentences.en: Valid federal regulations have the force of law and preempt state laws and rules.
sentences.cn: 有效的联邦规章有法律效力并且优于州法律、法规.

sentences.en: We arrived early at the theatre so as to preempt the front seats.
sentences.cn: 我们早早来到剧院,以便捷足先登占到前排座位.

words.tran_cn: 优先购买的；先发制人的；有先买权的
优先购买；强制收购；抢先占有；取代
获优先购买权者；先取者；先发制人者

trans.tran_en: If you preempt an action, you prevent it from happening by doing something that makes it unnecessary or impossible

trans.tran_cn: 先占，取代，先取，先发制人
